message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't have it all, let's start with a slight imbalance
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but you have to meet me in the middle
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but not as big as your last offer
You're getting close to the edge, don't push me
I'm not going to give in, you're going to have to meet me at the table
You're getting desperate, I'm taking control
This is my final offer, take it or leave it
You're not getting a penny, I'm taking it all
